page.title: 04THE B AND Q BUILDING
page.content: The building we think reflects life in Northolt in 1985 is the new{B & Q}Do It Yourself centre along the WESTERN AVENUE.It is a large building which sells equipment for home decoration. The outside of the building is covered in squares of BLUE tinted glass. Inside it is very spacious with large aisles in between rows of items on sale. There are over 14,000 different products under one roof. To help customers,wire trollies are available to carry goods around. Also seven checkout tills are situated at the front of the building. Outside, towards the back of the building there is a{small GARDEN CENTRE}selling garden accessories,etc. The opening hours of this shop are from 9am to 8pm from Monday to Saturday and from 10am and 6pm on a SUNDAY.
